isis.stitle: TSI 91-02-02 - Caster Setting For 02ADD and 02ADE Steer Axles

subjectgroup.subject: Caster Setting For 02ADD and 02ADE Steer Axles

geninfo.para: The lower limit caster specification for 9700 series vehicles with Spicer 02ADD and 02ADE, 12,000 and 14,000 pound capacity steer axles has been changed.
Effective October 3, 1990, 9700 series vehicles will have a factory lower limit caster setting of 0° to 1/2° positive (± 1/2°). A caster reading of 0° to 3° with a level frame is acceptable.
The reduced caster angle has proven to be effective with the subject axles and 9700 models in providing improved vehicle handling characteristics.
